data.name: FRIEND ON THE GO
data.detailed_description:
You're lonely and have no friends, until...
WELCOME TO FRIEND ON THE GO
A new computer game?
You download it and enjoy the beautiful mansion and island life... but then...
You realize the characters inside the game are missing people!
You need to help them GET OUT!
Help them solve unfinished business they have in the real world while you help them in the game world.
Solve the mystery of how they got there and who is behind all of this.

Professional voice acting
Original art
Original soundtrack



Walk around and explore :)

Battle system is more of a friend system!

Controls:
Walk: Arrow keys or WASD or click
Interact: Space, enter or click
Controller: D-PAD to walk and a to interact
